com.basho.riak.client
Class RiakBucketInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.basho.riak.client.RiakBucketInfo
Direct Known Subclasses:
JiakBucketInfo, RawBucketInfo
public class RiakBucketInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Represents the metadata stored in a bucket including its schema and the list of keys contained in the bucket. Note that the fields in the schema depend on the Riak interface being used.

Constructor Summary
RiakBucketInfo()
          Construct a bucket info to populate for a writeSchema request.
RiakBucketInfo(org.json.JSONObject schema, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> keys)
          Construct a bucket info using the JSON data from a listBucket() response.
 
Method Summary
 java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getKeys()
          The object keys in this bucket.
 org.json.JSONObject getSchema()
          Returns the list of properties in the schema and their values.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

RiakBucketInfo

public RiakBucketInfo(org.json.JSONObject schema,
                      java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> keys)
Construct a bucket info using the JSON data from a listBucket() response.

Parameters:

Method Detail

getSchema

public org.json.JSONObject getSchema()
Returns the list of properties in the schema and their values. The properties available is interface dependent. The properties composing this bucket's schema.

getKeys

public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getKeys()
The object keys in this bucket.
